dublin_core.dcvalue: Data were collected to pilot test the feasibility and effects of telecare as an intervention for depression in a small group of mothers with postpartum depression Treatment involved a 10 week telecare therapy consisting of three related aspects cognitive behavioral therapy relaxation techniques and problem solving strategies Beck Depression Inventory II scores were significantly lower after telecare treatment Women identified psycho education as the greatest help to them
Journal of psychosocial nursing and mental health services
Telecare for women with postpartum depression.
